blogPost.excerpt: Orapa is a per-per-intro marketplace where you can get introduced to your dream prospects. It feels like "Ads for referrals".
blogPost.body: Orapa is a per-per-intro marketplace where you can get introduced to your dream prospects. It feels like "Ads for referrals".
blogPost.title: Orapa 2.0 - Get warm intros to your dream prospects
blogPost.author: Stan Rymkiewicz

localize.description: Orapa是一个Per-Per-Introo市场，在那里你可以被介绍给你的梦想客户。感觉就像是“推荐广告”。
localize.tagline: 热情地介绍你的梦想前景

localize.description: Orapa是一個Per-Per-Introo市場，在那裏你可以被介紹給你的夢想客戶。感覺就像是“推薦廣告”。
localize.tagline: 熱情地介紹你的夢想前景

previous.excerpt: Control your television from your iPhone or iPad with TV Remote. * As featured on 9to5Mac * Compatible with: - LG - Samsung - Hitachi - Sharp - Toshiba - JVC - Bush - Techwood - Telefunken - Linsar - Polaroid - Luxor - Vestel - Finlux + MORE!
previous.title: TV Remote - Control your television using your iPhone or iPad.

localize.description: 使用电视遥控器从iPhone或iPad控制电视。*9to5Mac上的特色*兼容：-LG-Samsung-Hitachi-Sharp-Toshiba-JVC-Bush-Techwood-Telefunken-Linsar-Polaroid-Luxor-Vestl-Finlux+更多！
使用電視遙控器從iPhone或iPad控制電視。*9to5Mac上的特色*兼容：-LG-Samsung-Hitachi-Sharp-Toshiba-JVC-Bush-Techwood-Telefunken-Linsar-Polaroid-Luxor-Vestl-Finlux+更多！

next.excerpt: Our Polaris for Admin Web UI kit is now available in Figma. You can access the full kit in Figma with reusable components and up-to-date Polaris guidelines, icons, and color palette. Find out more at https://figma.com/@shopify and https://polaris.shopify.com
next.title: Polaris for Admin Figma UI kit - Shopify Polaris UI kit now available in Figma

localize.description: 我们的Polaris for Admin Web UI工具包现在可以在图中找到。您可以通过可重用组件和最新的北极星指南、图标和调色板访问Figma中的完整套件。欲了解更多信息，请访问https://figma.com/@shopify和https://polaris.shopify.com
localize.tagline: Shopify Polaris UI套件现已在图中提供

localize.description: 我們的Polaris for Admin Web UI工具包現在可以在圖中找到。您可以通過可重用組件和最新的北極星指南、圖標和調色板訪問Figma中的完整套件。欲瞭解更多信息，請訪問https://figma.com/@shopify和https://polaris.shopify.com
localize.tagline: Shopify Polaris UI套件現已在圖中提供
